TopicTitle: Epic ascent off the surface of the moon [Challenge]

Articles.Content:
Once you\'re on the moon with your rover,

Rev up and gain speed to about 150 meters per second, which is about 325 MPH.

Then find a hill, and jump it, and when your air-bourne, fire RSC tanks, separate from rover, and start ascent.

It\'s a nice way to save fuel. Or, the only way to get home if you\'re short of fuel! Just make sure you\'re moving the right direction, and try not to flip over. >D Does anyone have proof of actually pulling it off?
